dict.string:
res=$(CocoaDialog inputbox --title "Where to create project?" \ --informative-text "Example: ~/Development/Sites/mysite.com/" \ --button1 "Create" --button2 "Cancel")
[[ $(head -n1 <<<"$res") == "2" ]] && exit_discard
res=$(tail -n1 <<<"$res")
path=${res//\~/$HOME}
cp -r skel/ $path find $path -type f -name .DS_Store -print0 | xargs -0 rm
find $path -type d -name '.svn' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -rdf
